justification: Good nod to Team B’s mindset (trusts rankings) and a real Week 11 RB-bye/TE-upgrade incentive. However, it ignores Team A’s stated injury avoidance by asking A to take an injured TE, and the value is wildly lopsided against A (losing Tier 1 RB and TE for Tier 4 RB and injured TE). Rationale is terse and misses roster/role context and A’s incentives, making acceptance probability and overall coherence dubious.
